parameters.name: fdr
parameters.description: The upper bound of the expected false discovery rate.

parameters.name: fpr
parameters.description: The highest p-value for features to be kept.

parameters.name: fwe
parameters.description: The upper bound of the expected family-wise error rate.

parameters.name: numTopFeatures
parameters.description: Number of features that selector will select, ordered by ascending p-value. If the number of features is < numTopFeatures, then this will select all features.

parameters.name: percentile
parameters.description: Percentile of features that selector will select, ordered by ascending p-value.

parameters.name: selectorType
parameters.description: The selector type of the ChisqSelector. Supported options: numTopFeatures, percentile, fpr, fdr, fwe
